list.name: Khadija
list.definition: Muhammad's wife, a wealthy widow who ran a prosperous caravan business

list.name: Abu Bakr
list.definition: Muhammad's father-in-law and early convert to Islam who became the first caliph

list.name: Ali
list.definition: Muhammad's cousin and son-in-law who was assassinated after becoming the fourth caliph, trusted by Shi'ites

list.name: Abd al-Rahman
list.definition: Umayyad prince who escaped the Abbasid massacre of his family and fled to Spain to establish a new Umayyad dynasty

list.name: Abu al-Abbas
list.definition: Descendant of Muhammad's uncle who led a rebellion against the Umayyads and founded the Abbasid dynasty

list.name: al-Khwarizimi
list.definition: Muslim mathematician who pioneered the study of algebra

list.name: Ibn Sina (Avicenna)
list.definition: Muslim-Persian physician who wrote the Canon on Medicine
